short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Unix timestamps to local time format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timestamp Translate is a convenient extension that instantly converts all Unix timestamps on a page into human-readable format in real-time. With a single toggle button, similar to Google Translate, it transforms all timestamps on the page to an easily understandable format. It automatically updates the converted timestamps as the page content changes, providing an intuitive and efficient solution for users who frequently deal with timestamps.
